uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens

Class MenuScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.MapScreen
      • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.MenuScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class MenuScreen
extends MapScreen
    The MenuScreen is the first screen you will see when inside the game. After a game you will always return back to the menu.

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Description copied from class: MapScreen
        This method is called, when the screen is closed. It disposes all disposable instances, that have been created and stops the running music of the current screen.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
        Overrides:
        dispose in class MapScreen

        When you are in a certain area you will either start a game or go to settings.

        Overrides:
        render in class MapScreen
        Parameters:
